entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: WH advisers drawing up another exec order, expected this month, banning some new temporary, work-based visas. Expected to focus on H-1B (high-skilled workers) and H-2B (seasonal workers), as well as student visas & work authorization that accompanies them https://t.co/P2IOfF9e4W
